.git/hooks/post-receive.sample

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/bin/sh
00002 #
00003 # An example hook script for the "post-receive" event.
00004 #
00005 # The "post-receive" script is run after receive-pack has accepted a pack
00006 # and the repository has been updated.  It is passed arguments in through
00007 # stdin in the form
00008 #  <oldrev> <newrev> <refname>
00009 # For example:
00010 #  aa453216d1b3e49e7f6f98441fa56946ddcd6a20 68f7abf4e6f922807889f52bc043ecd31b79f814 refs/heads/master
00011 #
00012 # see contrib/hooks/ for a sample, or uncomment the next line and
00013 # rename the file to "post-receive".
00014 
00015 #. /usr/share/git-core/contrib/hooks/post-receive-email
